scripts.serve: cp tsconfig.debug.json tsconfig.json && ng serve --proxy-config proxy.conf.prod.json --ssl true --source-map --aot
scripts.build_prod: cp tsconfig.build.json tsconfig.json && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-core-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-forms-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-liveapps-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-handsontable-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-process-discovery-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-play-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-check-workflow-monitor-lib  && ng build --prod --base-href /webresource/apps/jeztest2/ --deploy-url /webresource/apps/jeztest2/ && cd ./dist/tc-liveapps/ && zip -r ./app.zip ./* && cd ../.. && cp tsconfig.debug.json tsconfig.json
scripts.build_prod_hash: cp tsconfig.build.json tsconfig.json && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-core-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-forms-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-liveapps-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-handsontable-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-process-discovery-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-play-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-check-workflow-monitor-lib  && ng build --prod --base-href /webresource/apps/jeztest2/index.html --deploy-url /webresource/apps/jeztest2/ && cd ./dist/tc-liveapps/ && zip -r ./app.zip ./* && cd ../.. && cp tsconfig.debug.json tsconfig.json
scripts.build_cwm: cp tsconfig.build.json tsconfig.json && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-core-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-forms-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-liveapps-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-handsontable-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-process-discovery-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-play-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-check-workflow-monitor-lib  && ng build --prod --base-href /webresource/apps/cwm/index.html --deploy-url /webresource/apps/cwm/ && cd ./dist/tc-liveapps/ && zip -r ./app.zip ./* && cd ../.. && cp tsconfig.debug.json tsconfig.json
scripts.build_pd: cp tsconfig.build.json tsconfig.json && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-core-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-forms-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-liveapps-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-handsontable-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-process-discovery-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-play-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-check-workflow-monitor-lib  && ng build --prod --base-href /webresource/apps/pd/index.html --deploy-url /webresource/apps/pd/ && cd ./dist/tc-liveapps/ && zip -r ./app.zip ./* && cd ../.. && cp tsconfig.debug.json tsconfig.json
scripts.build_all_libs_old: cp tsconfig.build.json tsconfig.json && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-core-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-liveapps-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-forms-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-handsontable-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-integration-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-lib && cp tsconfig.debug.json tsconfig.json
scripts.build_all_libs: cp tsconfig.build.json tsconfig.json && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-core-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-forms-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-liveapps-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-handsontable-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-process-discovery-lib && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-spotfire-play-lib  && ng build @tibco-tcstk/tc-check-workflow-monitor-lib && cp tsconfig.debug.json tsconfig.json
scripts.package: npm run build_lib && npm run npm_pack
